isis.stitle: TSI 99-12-11 - Performance Specifications for Model Year 1999 International® T 444E Engine Applications

subjectgroup.subject: Performance Specifications for Model Year 1999 International® T 444E Engine Applications

geninfo.para: Engine Performance Specifications are being released to service for the International T 444E Engine Applications.

note.para:
Emission label
on engine correctly identifies the Engine Model Year and Horsepower Rating.

figure.caption: Figure 1. 1999 MY International International T 444E Emission Label
